title: One-pot Japanese chicken
ingredients: ['225 g (8 oz) fine rice noodles', '600 ml (1 pint) chicken stock, preferably home-made', '550 g (1¼ lb) skinless boneless chicken breasts (fillets), thinly sliced', '225 g (8 oz) carrots, sliced', '200 g (7 oz) mange-tout', '1 can sliced bamboo shoots, about 220 g, drained', '125 g (4½ oz) shiitake mushrooms, sliced', '115 g (4 oz) Chinese leaves, shredded', 'Ponzu sauce', '3 tbsp mirin (sweet rice wine)', 'juice of 1 lemon', 'juice of 1½ limes', '3 tbsp rice vinegar', '90 ml (3 fl oz) dark soy sauce']
